price: A mos vallë ti (o Muhamed) do ta shkatërrosh veten, ngaqë ata (banorët e Mekës) nuk duan të besojnë?
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
